languages.text: "Не говорите потом, что бедная Идира вас не предупреждала". {n}Женщина кривится и с опаской тянется к увядшей лозе.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Не говорите потом, что бедная Идира вас не предупреждала". {n}Женщина кривится и с опаской тянется к увядшей лозе.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Don't say poor Idira didn't warn you." {n}The woman winces and cautiously reaches for the wilted wine.{/n}

languages.text: 「警告したからね」{n}彼女は顔をこわばらせ、慎重にツタに手を伸ばした。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Don't say poor Idira didn't warn you." {n}The woman winces and cautiously reaches for the wilted wine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「警告したからね」{n}彼女は顔をこわばらせ、慎重にツタに手を伸ばした。{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «No diga que la pobre Idira no se lo advirtió». {n}La mujer se estremece y, cautelosamente, alarga la mano hacia la enredadera marchita.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Don't say poor Idira didn't warn you." {n}The woman winces and cautiously reaches for the wilted wine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No diga que la pobre Idira no se lo advirtió». {n}La mujer se estremece y, cautelosamente, alarga la mano hacia la enredadera marchita.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “别说我没警告过你。”{n}伊迪拉有些犹豫，小心翼翼地朝枯萎的蔓藤伸出了手。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Don't say poor Idira didn't warn you." {n}The woman winces and cautiously reaches for the wilted wine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “别说我没警告过你。”{n}伊迪拉有些犹豫，小心翼翼地朝枯萎的蔓藤伸出了手。{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Vous ne pourrez pas dire que la pauvre Idira ne vous a pas {mf|prévenu|prévenue}. » {n}Elle tressaille et tend prudemment la main vers la plante flétrie.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Don't say poor Idira didn't warn you." {n}The woman winces and cautiously reaches for the wilted wine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous ne pourrez pas dire que la pauvre Idira ne vous a pas {mf|prévenu|prévenue}. » {n}Elle tressaille et tend prudemment la main vers la plante flétrie.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Sagt nicht, dass die arme Idira Euch nicht gewarnt hat." {n}Die Frau verzieht das Gesicht und greift vorsichtig nach dem welken Wein.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Don't say poor Idira didn't warn you." {n}The woman winces and cautiously reaches for the wilted wine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sagt nicht, dass die arme Idira Euch nicht gewarnt hat." {n}Die Frau verzieht das Gesicht und greift vorsichtig nach dem welken Wein.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Kimse de zavallı İdira bizi uyarmadı demesin." {n}İdira, yüzünü buruşturup solmuş asma dalına temkinle uzanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Don't say poor Idira didn't warn you." {n}The woman winces and cautiously reaches for the wilted wine.{/n}
